---
name: process-validate
description: Validate a process folder against the process contract conventions.
argument-hint: "process-id"
---
# Task: Validate a process

1) Find the process folder under docs/processes/<process-id>/.
2) Confirm process.md exists and includes required sections.
3) Confirm steps/ exists and files are numbered.
4) Confirm outputs/output-contract.md exists.
5) Report gaps and suggested fixes.
